MUSIC OF THE EARTH 

"Astonishing and rare instruments" 






Musicians from all parts of the world have throughout the centuries drawn their inspiration from the most improbable forms, from the most unexpected materials to create melodies and harmonies that would charm their contemporaries and would express a wide range of feelings and emotions.
